title: Cry Little Sister
lyrics:
Last fire will rise
Behind those eyes
Black house will rock
Blind boys don't lie
Immortal fear
That voice so clear

Through broken walls

That scream I hear!



Cry, little sister! (Thou shalt not fall)

Come, come to your brother! (Thou shalt not die)

Unchain me, sister! (Thou shalt not fear)

Love is with your brother! (Thou shalt not kill)



Blue masquerade

Strangers look on

When will they learn

This loneliness?

Temptation heat

Beats like a drum

Deep in your veins

I will not lie



Little sister! (Thou shalt not fall)

Come, come to your brother! (Thou shalt not die)

Unchain me, sister! (Thou shalt not fear)

Love is with your brother! (Thou shalt not kill)



My Shangri-Las

I can't forget

Why you were mine

I need you now!



Cry, little sister! (Thou shalt not fall)

Come, come to your brother! (Thou shalt not die)

Unchain me, sister! (Thou shalt not fear)

Love is with your brother! (Thou shalt not kill)

Cry, little sister! (Thou shalt not fall)

Come, come to your brother! (Thou shalt not die)

Unchain me, sister! (Thou shalt not fear)

Love is with your brother! (Thou shalt not kill)
